storage_account_name.title: Storage Account Name
storage_account_name.description: The name of the storage account where the raw, scratch, and enriched data will be stored in separate containers.

raw_container.title: Raw Container
raw_container.description: The name of the container where the raw data will be stored.

scratch_container.title: Scratch Container
scratch_container.description: The name of the container where intermediate data transformations or experimental analyst data will be stored.

enriched_container.title: Enriched Container
enriched_container.description: The name of the container where curated data assets will be stored.

application_id.title: Azure Application ID
application_id.description: The Azure Application ID for databricks jobs.

data-producer.description: The IAM role for the data producer service principal that can read/write to the raw layer of the data lake.

data-processsing.description: The IAM role for the data processing service principal with read only access to the raw layer and read / write access to the scratch / enriched layers of the data lake.

data-asset-consumer.description: The IAM role for the enriched data asset consumer service principal read only acces to the enriched layer of the data lake.
